You've got data? We've got solutions.

  • Tell me more

We empower researchers in academia and industry to explore, understand, and communicate their data through consulting and teaching.

Data Consulting

We specialize in statistical analysis, machine learning, data visualization, and R Shiny dashboard development. We also write academic papers and narrative reports in a way that is clear, informative, and accessible to the average person.

Learn More →

Data Science Workshops

We conduct workshops, classes, and private tutorials in data collection, processing, and analysis for individuals and groups of diverse skill level and area of expertise.

Learn More →
